thread.title: What Time Is the Mets Game on Tonight?
thread.title_full: What Time Is the Mets Game on Tonight?

title: What Time Is the Mets Game on Tonight?
text:
QUEENS â€” #LGM ! 
The Mets are looking to send the Dodgers packing in their game 4 matchup against Los Angeles at Citi Field Tuesday night. 
After crushing L.A. 13-7 at home on Monday night to take a 2-1 series lead , the Amazins will look to move on to the National League Championship series, with the first pitch for Tuesday's game scheduled for 8:07 p.m. 
If victorious, the team will face the winner of the Chicago Cubs-St. Louis Cardinals series , which the Cubbies lead 2-1 heading into Tuesday's afternoon game at Wrigley Field. 
The Mets game will air on TBS , with coverage starting at 8 p.m.
